structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 66. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The board shall independently adopt procedures and regulations as necessary to implement the requirements of sections thirty-eight A1/2 to thirty-eight O, inclusive. Such procedures and regulations may vary according to the class of project.
